attributes.action: To appoint responsibility to an appropriate person or organisation for the use of clear language in public information from public services, starting with the Metropolitan Police.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The terminology of 'multi-perpetrator rape' in the recent Metropolitan Police Authority report, has replaced the already widely understood and accepted term 'gang rape'. This is a direct result of academic studies.  This is not an accurate definition of gang rape.  Any changes to this or any other familiar language associated with crime should clearly reflect the true nature of the act in every aspect, without appearing to sanitise or 'clean-up crime' with jargon.
